title: Bug 50793: Invalid DispatchType in ServletRequestListener on async dispatch
description: Bug 50793: Invalid DispatchType in ServletRequestListener on async dispatch
OB: When a ServletRequestListener is invoked after a call to AsyncContext.dispatch(), the DispatcherType returned from the ServletRequest is REQUEST instead of ASYNC.
EB: The expected behavior is that after a call to AsyncContext.dispatch(), the DispatcherType returned from the ServletRequest should be ASYNC.
SR: Ensure that the ServletRequestListener correctly reflects the DispatcherType as ASYNC after the invocation of AsyncContext.dispatch().
